.
References for Special Authorization Procedures
For information on special authorization procedures for a(n)
custodian recognized under
38 U.S.C. 5502
, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.E.4.d
, and
institutionalized Veteran's award, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.F
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section E - Authorizing Awards for Fiduciary Cases
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section E
